thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: noodlechinese

author: noodlechinese
title: noodlechinese
text:
this is my 3rd time to book with amoma.com, so far i did not encounter any problem with amoma and i always reconfirm with the hotel by writing
but with my latest booking recently, i just discover amoma.com website do not provide email address for their customer support instead you need to call.
if I am searching for cheap hotel rates, I do not think I have to call because that will top up the hotel rates that I book
i can not find the ibis riverside hotel bangkok direct email address, so i need amoma.com customer service to provide me the email address of ibis riverside hotel bangkok
also I need the ibis riverside hotel bangkok direct email address, I do not need the accor email address in general, because accor do not reply to customer if you do not book direct with accor
in general, other hotel online website, they always provide hotel email address, I just wonder why amoma.com do not provide hotel email address, only telephone no., as I have said, I do not need to call because it will top up my hotel rates, this is very inconvenient
also next time, if I have a problem with my booking, I can not even email amoma.com instead I have to call
online hotel website business are done by system, so I think email address is important because everything is done thru writing, in case there is a problem - there is support to prove in writing, than calling and arguing “I said, you said”.
